entry.value: set tez.queue.name=ets; drop table if exists itdatastore.eol_mitigation; create external table vmar_dataset.eol_mitigation ( report_date string, server_name string, near_term_remediation_plan string, near_term_plan_completion_date string, near_term_actual_completion_date string, long_term_remediation_plan string, long_term_plan_completion_date string, long_term_actual_completion_date string, plan_owner string, archer_issue_number string, archer_cap_number string, extended_maintenance_contract string, application_names string, application_owner string, bu_sl string, ptg_champion string, reserved_status string, segment string, last_updated string, ptgvm_team_comments string, cb_agent_install_date string, environment string, reserved_near_term_plan_month string, reserved_near_term_actual_completed_month string, reserved_plan_year_week_year string, reserved_actual_completion_year_week string, bu_comment1 string, bu_comment2 string, bu_comment3 string, bu_comment4 string ) row format serde 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.OpenCSVSerde' stored as textfile location '/apps/encrypted/grp/itdatastore/vm_mitigation/';

set tez.queue.name=ets; drop table if exists itdatastore.eol_mitigation; create external table vmar_dataset.eol_mitigation ( report_date string, server_name string, near_term_remediation_plan string, near_term_plan_completion_date string, near_term_actual_completion_date string, long_term_remediation_plan string, long_term_plan_completion_date string, long_term_actual_completion_date string, plan_owner string, archer_issue_number string, archer_cap_number string, extended_maintenance_contract string, application_names string, application_owner string, bu_sl string, ptg_champion string, reserved_status string, segment string, last_updated string, ptgvm_team_comments string, cb_agent_install_date string, environment string, reserved_near_term_plan_month string, reserved_near_term_actual_completed_month string, reserved_plan_year_week_year string, reserved_actual_completion_year_week string, bu_comment1 string, bu_comment2 string, bu_comment3 string, bu_comment4 string ) row format serde 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.OpenCSVSerde' stored as textfile location '/apps/encrypted/grp/itdatastore/vm_mitigation/';

processors.name: SFTP CSV File 1 from Edge Node
